message.body: hey there night rider
hey there elvira
late one, huh?
I suppose. Theyve been late, lately
insomnia can be a motherfucker
you think you're an insomniac?
just the past few days
Im going though one of my "phases"
hate those....
most of the time. 15% of the time they're freakin awesome....in my opinioin
yeah im not particularly liking this one
Its not as bad as when I was going to quit my job and get rid of my stuff and move to the woods
but it compares? woah
certainly not in extremeness, but a little
It's more of a 'I have nothing to complain about, but somehow I am not satisfied with some aspect of my life' kind of attitude
well nothing to complain about but anything to rave about?
nothing more than doing what I want, when I want, and that really should be enough...I mean its more than most have
are you doin what you want when you want?
yeah...i think that's pretty much as good as it gets
for the most part yes
I mean within reason of course, I dont want to pay bills but I do
I answer to no one, I work when I want to, but always seem to have things to do, while still managing to relax and enjoy life
what about love? friendship? being wanted?
i might be going deeper than I can handle...or somehwere I shouldn't
no..actually I think you're right on target
Ive placed love in a category of 'nice to have, but not necessary'
truth be told, I have been seeing someone for a few weeks now, but it hasnt made much difference
how do you feel about that person?
have you heard of avoidant attachment?
well I certainly like them, but its not a huge deal to me right now
can't say that I have
I think the main problem is that this person seems a little too into me...
hahahha
you dare to laugh at my problems?
i do. that was funny
again, these are my problems...seriously?
I don't think one can laught too much.
c'mon that was ironic. lighten up
me neither, there is never a reason not to laugh, imo
no im j.k of course, I am glad that you are amused
Im not sure I catch the irony though
well, nevermind.....not worth getting into
I like her in the fact that I continue to see her
I have to be up in less than 6 hours for class.
you like that she likes you, but you don't lke that at the same time
and Ive been clear on the whole not really looking for a relationship thing, and she understands
but she doesnt act like it. she acts like whe wants a relationship and I am afraid that she will be dissapointed/heartbroken
eh, you warned her...
ok...I'm headin to bed.
tbc
exactly, but people hear what they want to hear. k....night night
